pages.text: The $(bold)Explode$() command is a trick that must be handled very carefully.$(br2)While your Pet Rock™ might be more that willing to follow your orders, it has been documented that when certain laboratory rocks are pressed together, it can result in a massive explosion.$(br2)In controlled environments,

this release of energy can be captured and used to boil water very efficiently.$(br2)While your Pet Rock™ may not be capable of such extreme feats, it is more than willing to do its best at your behest.
